TopicTitle: Can't get away from a hitchhiker storage container

Articles.Content:
Once again I find an agoraphobic Kerbal.

It's a rescue contract, I can switch to the container and EVA the Kerbal normally--but that's as far as it goes.

Last time I could walk the Kerbal up the ladder and he fell off into space but this time he won't even climb either way on the ladder.

I just switched over to my rocket that has one of those containers on it--same problem.  A Kerbal that goes EVA out that hatch won't move.

Note that they're still willing to go back into the rocket.

Update:  I switched to the agoraphobe from the tracking center, he EVAed normally.

Update:  I think the part is a coincidence.  Since then I've encountered it twice more with different modules.

Edited December 30, 2016 by Loren Pechtel
